Visa got approvedby Jian

Today is a big day for me, I was approved for my F1 visa. I can’t say I am lucky, because everything that I have done was granted. And based on this thinking, instead of rejoice, I feel so tired that it costed me so long to get everthing right on the way, and this is just the begining of my new choice.

Universal Mindmap Cloud Constructionby Jian

I have been thinking about a structure for a long time. This structure is shapeless like a piece of cloud which can include anything in the universe. once this structure is constructed, it can solve any problem, even solve problems that will happen in the future. This structure is exist, since it is trememdous, no one think it as a whole.
